titles.title: Only A Sinner Saved By Grace**

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A
Naught have I gotten
but what I received
Grace hath bestowed
it since I have believed
Boasting excluded
pride I abase
I'm only a sinner
saved by grace

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Only a sinner
saved by grace
Only a sinner
saved by grace
This is my story
to God be the glory
I'm only a sinner
saved by grace

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Once I was foolish
and sin ruled my heart
Causing my footsteps
from God to depart
Jesus hath found me
happy my case
I now am a sinner
saved by grace

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tears unvailing
no merit had I
Mercy had saved me
or else I must die
sin had alarmed me
fearing God's face
But now I'm a sinner
saved by grace

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Suffer a sinner
whose heart overflows
Loving his Savior
to tell what he knows
Once more to tell it
would I embrace
I'm only a sinner
saved by grace
